entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Gogama
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:57 p.m. EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Snow mixed with ice pellets overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 6:07 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of ice pellets or snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times mixed with ice pellets changing to ice pellets in the morning then to freezing rain and a few flurries late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the morning and afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 50 in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:07 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Temperature rising to 8 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain and a few flurries ending late in the evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers changing to 60 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming south 20 gusting to 50 near midnight then west 30 gusting to 60 overnight. Temperature rising to 8 by morning. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 6:07 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries. High minus 3. Forecast issued 6:07 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 11. Forecast issued 6:07 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High zero.
entry.summary: Sunny. High zero. Forecast issued 6:07 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 14. Forecast issued 6:07 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. High plus 5. Forecast issued 6:07 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 6:07 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers. High 9. Forecast issued 6:07 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 30 percent chance of showers. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 6:07 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 13.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High 13. Forecast issued 6:07 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
